titles: Mr. Glyn, his speech in Parliament, vpon the reading of the accusation of the House of Commons against Mr. Herbert the Kings attorney, for advising and drawing the accusation of high treason against the six worthy members of the House of Commons. February 19. An. Dom. 1641
author: Glynne, John, Sir, 1603-1666.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
